alert.note: Alert for Gosper; Hamilton; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 15 at 2:24PM CST until February 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Hamilton, York and Gosper Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall is expected to increase across Interstate 80 and areas north of Interstate 80 during the afternoon and evening hours, with the highest accumulations expected from roughly 6 PM Wednesday through around 6 AM Thursday morning. There will be a sharp cutoff in snowfall amounts on the north side of this snow band, with areas just north of the band likely receiving much less snow than is forecast in the warning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
